title: Drawing, "Design for an Altar Mensa, Possibly for Santa  Maria del Priorato", 1764–66
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: In the opening of the altar mensa stands a bathtub sarcophagus with two lion's heads at the base below the dividing vertical strips. In the central panel are two crossed palm branches, a wreath and a PX.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for an Altar Mensa, Possibly for Santa  Maria del Priorato", 1764–66.
1764–66. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-4192.
